summary: Requiem 1.8.x patch for Wintermyst - Enchantments of Skyrim by Enai Siaion and T3nd0
descriptionHtml:
Requiem 1.8.x patch for Wintermyst - Enchantments of Skyrim by Enai Siaion and T3nd0

Wintermyst's bugfixes have been applied to Requiem's [size=2]existing enchantments[/size]. Requiem's [size=2]existing enchantments [/size]have been returned to Requiem's names, descriptions, and values. Unlevel leveled list applied.

[u]Installation:[/u]
Use NMM, MO, or just extract Requiem - Wintermyst.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.

[u]Load order:[/u]
Use LOOT or place Requiem - Wintermyst.esp after Requiem and Wintermyst and before Requiem for the Indifferent.

Skyrim.esm
....
....
....
....
Requiem.esp
....
Wintermyst - Enchantments of Skyrim.esp
....
Requiem - Wintermyst.esp
....
Bashed Patch, 0.esp
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp

[u]Wrye Bash Users:[/u]
Change the Bash Tags on Requiem - Wintermyst.esp from "Automatic" to "Delev" and "Relev"
Otherwise, Wrye Bash will add Wintermyst's Leveled List into the Bashed Patch.

[u]Credits/Thanks:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]: Ogerboss and Xarrian
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58635/?]Wintermyst - Enchantments of Skyrim[/url]: Enai Siaion and T3nd0
author: spikyfishy

files.name: Requiem - Wintermyst v2.01
files.changelogHtml:
Wintermyst is now deleveled. Thanks to alstrekalov.
Thanks to fireundubh for the unlevel script.
